name: Little Hatume-リトルハツメ
description:
Burn ! Pixel spirit !

I have the idea of this game After I played MOMODORA 4 ,

I was impressed by those pretty pixel art (ﾉ∀`*)

In addition , all the character of this little game is Unoriginal

this little game is based on LittleNoah (https://littlenoah.jp/)

......That's all ! Hope you enjoy it !

......and sorry about my poor english(´;ω;`)
